input.sentences: the dog was exhausted after a long day .
the poodle showed off its pink dye all over its body .
the dogs patiently awaited someone to pet them .
she was so eager to present her chihuahua dog .
she is testing the skills of her dog .
output.sentences: The exhausted french bull dog had a fun day, it starts dreaming for the memories from today.
He remember a pretty poodle that was pink because the poodle wanted to dye its fur.
As kids pass by to pet the dogs, him and his friends waits patiently to see if other dogs wants to join them.
After he finished hanging out with his friends him ad his human was eager to see a show about a dog named chihuahua.
And at the end of the day he went to go testing his amazing skills and was awarded for being the best dog of them all.
